# Project Model Approaches

## Linear Models

- Linear Regression

  - 1 dependent 1  or more predictor variable

- Ridge Regression

  - Shrinkage Technique
  
  - Minimizes RSS

- LASSO
  
  - Fixes Ridge shortfall allowing varable to be exactly zero

## Non-linear Approaches

- Decision Tree

  - Possible outcome for different decisions

- SVM

  - Minimize outliers using support vectors
  
## Compare Keras NN

- Keras

  - Neural Network attemp to predict closest sample by mean of response

- Kalman imputation

  - Times series function to impute missing values

# Data Discussion

## Data Description

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
Columns<-c('DateTime','ManagedEntityGUID','ObjectName','CoutnerName','SampleValue','AlertName','AlertDescription','Severity','Priority','ServerName','Ticket')
Data_Description<-c('Date stamp of alert','Identity of monitored object','Name of component', 'Performance Metric Name', 'Value of Metric','Alert Generated','Description of Alert Generated','Severity of Alert','Priority of Alert','Name of Server', 'Was a ticket generated')
def<-as.data.frame(Data_Description,Columns)
kable(def,)
```
